scripts.dev:server: cd service/dist/server && set NODE_ENV=development&& concurrently -k --handle-input -n tsc-srv,nm "tsc --build ../../tsconfig.json -w" "nodemon --delay 2.5 app.js"
scripts.dev:agent: cd service/dist/agent && set NODE_ENV=development&& concurrently -k --handle-input -n tsc-agn,nm "tsc -p ../../tsconfig.json -w" "nodemon --delay 2.5 app.js"
